item.title: DataTables Pagination with Twitter Bootstrap
item.description: As a developer who likes to spend more time with beautiful object-oriented code rather than mark-up, DataTables is a wonderful tool for me, with a growing list of extendable features.

item.title: Clicked Link Attributes in jQuery Mobile Events
item.description: So…are you tired of writing and rewriting (or commenting out) Javascript and want to handle your clicked link attributes inside of a jQuery Mobile event? Here’s how:
